bg.x2d.gen

Class ColorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.x2d.gen.ColorGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Generator<Color>

    public class ColorGenerator
extends Object
implements Generator<Color>
    Generates random colors using a custom configuration of constant and randomized color channels.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke
